Sentencas: Developing cost-effective methods to prepare ceramic interconnect thin membrane for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stacks is currently considered as a major technical obstacle.
Titulo: Fabrication of Dense La0.7Ca0.3Cr0.97O3-δ Interconnect Thin Membrane on Composite Anode Support by Co-firing

Sentencas: In order to improve co-firing compatibility of the traditional anode support NiO/YSZ with LaCrO3-based interconnects, chemically stable interconnect material of Y0.7Ca0.3Cr0.9Zn0.1O3-delta (YCCZ) was introduced to NiO/YSZ anode.
Titulo: Fabrication of Dense La0.7Ca0.3Cr0.97O3-δ Interconnect Thin Membrane on Composite Anode Support by Co-firing

Sentencas: Triple-phase composite NiO/YSZ/YCCZ with the weight ratio of 6:4:2 was prepared, and then examined as novel anode support.
Titulo: Fabrication of Dense La0.7Ca0.3Cr0.97O3-δ Interconnect Thin Membrane on Composite Anode Support by Co-firing

Sentencas: Sintering character, microstructure, electrical conductivity, and thermal expansion coefficient of the composite anode were respectively investigated in detail as a function of YCCZ addition.
Titulo: Fabrication of Dense La0.7Ca0.3Cr0.97O3-δ Interconnect Thin Membrane on Composite Anode Support by Co-firing

Sentencas: Results indicate the NiO/YSZ/YCCZ anode has excellent overall performance.
Titulo: Fabrication of Dense La0.7Ca0.3Cr0.97O3-δ Interconnect Thin Membrane on Composite Anode Support by Co-firing

Sentencas: Furthermore, by using a simple and cost-effective drop-coating/co-firing process, dense La0.7Ca0.3Cr0.97O3-delta interconnect thin membrane was successfully prepared on the novel NiO/YSZ/YCCZ anode support.
Titulo: Fabrication of Dense La0.7Ca0.3Cr0.97O3-δ Interconnect Thin Membrane on Composite Anode Support by Co-firing

Sentencas: This work provides a simple technical solution for dense ceramic interconnect fabrication for YSZ-based SOFC stacks.
Titulo: Fabrication of Dense La0.7Ca0.3Cr0.97O3-δ Interconnect Thin Membrane on Composite Anode Support by Co-firing
